page.shortlink: Empty Objects are Taking up Space on The Report
page.topic: Empty Objects are Taking up Space on The Report
page.description: A Report has controls that is taking up space when there is no content.

discussion.p: Objects in a Report will take up the full space given to them during design time unless the 'Can Shrink' property is enabled. This is a requirement for pre-printed forms.

If an object contains no data (is blank), this can create empty space in the report. For objects that require a large initial size (such as an image), this can result in large areas of unwanted blank space in a report. To eliminate the space occupied by blank controls, the control's *[ui:Shrinkable]* property must be enabled.
